name: officedev-copilot-for-m365-plugins-samples-msgext-multiparam-csharp
title: Using multiple parameters in a plugin for Microsoft 365 Copilot using .NET
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use multiple parameters in a plugin for Microsoft 365 Copilot using .NET and Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio Code.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use multiple parameters in a plugin for Microsoft 365 Copilot using .NET and Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio. It demonstrates how developers can use multi parameters in Microsoft 365 Copilot to support complex utterances and deep retrieval.

thumbnails.alt: Plugin response from Copilot with reference preview Adaptive Card displayed
